description.english: Beat a wave without taking core damage.
description.german: Schaffe eine Welle ohne Schaden am Kern zu nehmen.
description.french: Finir une vague sans que votre noyau soit touché
description.italian: Batti un'ondata senza subire danni al nucleo.
description.spanish: Gana una ola sin que se dañe el núcleo.
description.schinese: 在未受到核心伤害的情况下击退一波敌人。
description.russian: Пройдите волну так, чтобы ядро не получило урона.
description.polish: Pokonaj falę bez ponoszenia obrażeń rdzenia.
description.brazilian: Complete uma onda sem tomar danos no core.

description.german: Installiere ein Modul.
description.french: Installer un module de noyau
description.italian: Installa un modulo del nucleo.
description.spanish: Instala un nucleo.
description.schinese: 安装一个核心模块。
description.russian: Установите модуль ядра.
description.brazilian: Instale um núcleo.

description.german: Besiege einen Boss.
description.french: Battre un boss.
description.italian: Batti un boss.
description.spanish: Derrota un jefe.
description.schinese: 击败一个Boss。
description.russian: Победите босса.
description.brazilian: Derrote um chefe.

description.english: Defeat at least seven bosses in one run.
description.german: Besiege mindestens sieben Bosse in einer Runde.
description.french: Vaincre au moins 7 boss en une partie.
description.italian: Sconfiggi almeno sette boss in una corsa.
description.spanish: Derrota al menos siete jefes en una partida.
description.schinese: 一轮击败至少7个Boss。
description.russian: Убейте не менее семи боссов за один проход.
description.polish: Pokonaj wszystkich siedmiu bosów w jednej grze.
description.brazilian: Derrote pelo menos 7 chefes em uma única jogatina.

description.german: Finde einen seltenen Turm.
description.french: Obtenir une tour rare.
description.italian: Ottieni una torretta rara.
description.spanish: Consigue una torre rara.
description.schinese: 获得一个稀有的塔。
description.russian: Получите редкую башню.
description.brazilian: Consiga uma torre rara.

description.german: Finde eine seltene Fähigkeit.
description.french: Obtenir une capacité rare.
description.italian: Ottieni un'abilità rara.
description.spanish: Consigue una habilidad rara.
description.schinese: 获得一个稀有的技能。
description.russian: Получите редкую способность.
description.brazilian: Consiga uma habilidade rara.

description.german: Erhalte eine seltene Verbesserung.
description.french: Obtenir une amélioration rare.
description.italian: Ottieni un aggiornamento raro.
description.spanish: Consigue una mejora rara.
description.schinese: 获得一个稀有的升级。
description.russian: Получите редкое улучшение.
description.brazilian: Consiga um upgrade raro.

description.german: Finde ein seltenes Modul.
description.french: Obtenir un module de noyau rare
description.italian: Ottieni un modulo nucleo raro.
description.spanish: Consigue un modulo de núcleo raro.
description.schinese: 获得一个稀有的模块。
description.russian: Получить редкий основной модуль.
description.brazilian: Consiga um módulo de núcleo raro.

description.english: Beat the game with exactly one tower and without abilities.
description.german: Gewinne eine Runde mit nur einem Turm.
description.french: Finir une partie avec une seule tour.
description.italian: Completa la partita con una sola torretta.
description.spanish: Completa el juego con una sola torre.
description.schinese: 仅用一个塔打通游戏。
description.russian: Пройдите игру только с одной башней.
description.polish: Przejdź grę z tylko jedną wieżą.
description.brazilian: Finalize o jogo com apenas uma torre.

description.english: Beat the game with seven towers.
description.german: Gewinne eine Runde mit sieben Türmen.
description.french: Finir une partie avec sept tours.
description.italian: Completa la partita con sette torrette.
description.spanish: Completa el juego con siete torres.
description.schinese: 用七个塔打通游戏。
description.russian: Пройдите игру, используя всего семь башен.
description.brazilian: Finalize o jogo com apenas sete torres.

description.english: Beat the game without taking core damage.
description.german: Gewinne ein Spiel ohne, dass der Kern Schaden nimmt.
description.french: Finir une partie sans que votre cœur ne prenne de dégâts.
description.italian: Completa la partita senza subire alcun danno al nucleo.
description.spanish: Completa el juego sin que el nucleo reciba daño.
description.schinese: 在核心未收到伤害的情况下游戏通关。
description.russian: Пройдите игру так, чтобы ядро не получило урона.
description.polish: Przejdź grę bez otrzymania obrażeń rdzenia.
description.brazilian: Finalize o jogo sem que o núcleo leve dano.

description.german: Gewinne eine Runde mit dem Schwierigkeitsgrad "Schwer".
description.french: Finir une partie en mode "Difficile".
description.italian: Completa il gioco al livello "Difficile".
description.spanish: Completa el juego en dificultad "Difícil".
description.schinese: 在困难难度下游戏通关。
description.russian: Пройдите игру на сложности "Сложно".
description.brazilian: Finalize o jogo na dificuldade "Difícil".

displayName.german: Ist das alles was du drauf hast
displayName.french: C'est tout ce que tu as dans le ventre ?
displayName.spanish: Es esto todo lo que tienes
displayName.russian: Это всё, на что ты способен?
displayName.polish: To Wszystko Na Co Cię Stać
displayName.brazilian: Isso É O Melhor Que Pode Fazer?

description.german: Gewinne ein Spiel mit dem Schwierigkeitsgrad "Überschwer 5".

description.german: Finde dieselbe Verbesserung zwei mal.
description.french: Obtenez la même amélioration 2 fois.

description.german: Schalte alle Belohnungen frei.
description.french: Débloquer toutes les récompenses.
description.italian: Sbloccare tutte le ricompense.
description.spanish: Desbloquea todas las recompensas.
description.schinese: 解开所有奖励。
description.russian: Разблокируйте все награды.

description.german: Entdecke alles im Kompendium.
description.french: Tout découvrir du compendium.
description.italian: Scopri tutto nel compendium.
description.spanish: Descubre todo en el compendio.
description.schinese: 发现百科中的所有词条。
description.russian: Откройте всё возможное в компендиуме.
description.brazilian: Descubra tudo o que há no compendium.

description.english: Beat the game without core modules.
description.german: Gewinne eine Runde ohne Module.
description.french: Finir une partie sans ajouter de modules à votre noyau.
description.italian: Completa il gioco senza i moduli Nucleo.
description.spanish: Ganar el juego sin módulos centrales.
description.schinese: 在未使用核心模块的情况下游戏通关。
description.russian: Пройдите игру, не используя модули ядра.
description.brazilian: Complete o jogo sem módulos de núcleo.

description.english: Beat the game with 40 or more rares.
description.german: Gewinne eine Runde mit 40 oder mehr seltenen Belohnungen.
description.french: Finir une partie avec 40 récompenses rares ou plus.
description.italian: Completa il gioco con 40 o più rarità.
description.spanish: Ganar el juego con 40 o más rarezas.
description.schinese: 用至少40个稀有物品打通游戏。
description.russian: Закончите игру с 40 или больше редких вещей
description.polish: Przejdź grę z co najmniej 40 unikatami.
description.brazilian: Complete o jogo com 40 ou mais raros.

description.german: Gewinne eine Runde ohne seltene Belohungen
description.french: Finir une partie sans récompenses rares.
description.italian: Completa la partita senza rarità.
description.spanish: Ganar el juego sin rarezas.
description.schinese: 在没有稀有物品的情况下游戏通关。
description.russian: Закончите игру без редких вещей
description.brazilian: Complete o jogo sem itens raros.

description.english: Beat the game without uncommon or rare rewards.
description.german: Gewinne eine Runde ohne ungewöhnliche oder seltene Belohnungen.
description.french: Finir une partie sans récompenses peu communes ou rares.
description.italian: Completa il gioco senza ricompense rare o ultra rare.
description.spanish: Ganar el juego sin recompensas poco comunes o raras.
description.schinese: 在没有罕见或稀有奖励的情况下游戏通关。
description.russian: Пройдите игру без необычных или редких наград.
description.polish: Przejdź grę bez częstych nagród i unikatów.
description.brazilian: Finalize o jogo sem recompensas incomum ou raras.

description.english: Beat the game without losing a tower.
description.german: Gewinne eine Runde ohne einen Turm zu verlieren
description.french: Finir une partie sans perdre de tour.
description.italian: Completa la partita senza perdere una torretta.
description.spanish: Ganar el juego sin perder una torre.
description.schinese: 在没有损失一座塔的情况下游戏通关。
description.russian: Пройди игру, не потеряв вышку.
description.brazilian: Finalize o jogo sem perder nenhuma torre.

description.english: Beat the game without letting a mob escape.
description.german: Gewinne eine Runde ohne Gegner entkommen zu lassen.
description.french: Finir une partie sans laisser s'échapper d'ennemis.
description.italian: Completa la partita senza far sopravvivere un mob.
description.spanish: Completa el juego sin dejar que un enemigo escape
description.schinese: 在没有让一个小怪逃逸的情况下游戏通关。
description.russian: Пройдите игру, не дав ни единому мобу сбежать.
description.polish: Przejdź grę bez ucieczki żadnego przeciwnika.
description.brazilian: Finalize o jogo sem que nenhum inimigo fuja.

description.english: Beat the game without healing towers or abilities.
description.german: Gewinne eine Runde ohne heilende Türme oder Fähigkeiten.
description.french: Finir une partie sans tour ou capacité de soin.
description.italian: Completa la partita senza torri curative o abilita.
description.spanish: Completa el juego sin torres sanadoras o habilidades.
description.schinese: 在没有治疗塔或治疗技能的情况下游戏通关。
description.russian: Пройдите игру без лечебных башен или способностей.
description.polish: Przejdź grę bez uzdrawiających wież czy umiejętności.
description.brazilian: Complete o jogo sem consertar torres ou habilidades.

description.english: Beat the game without killing a single mob.
description.german: Gewinne das Spiel ohne einen einzigen Gegner zu töten
description.french: Finir une partie sans détruire un seul ennemi.
description.italian: Vinci il gioco senza uccidere alcun nemico
description.spanish: Completa el juego sin eliminar enemigos.
description.schinese: 在不杀死一个暴徒的情况下游戏通关。
description.russian: Пройдите игру, не убив ни единого моба.
description.brazilian: Vença o jogo sem matar nenhum inimigo.

description.english: Finish a wave with a fully shielded Core.
description.german: Schließe eine Welle mit einem komplett geschützten Core ab
description.french: Terminer une vague avec un noyau entièrement blindé
description.italian: Completa un'ondata con un Nucleo completamente schermato
description.spanish: Completa una oleada con un nucleo totalmente escudado.
description.schinese: 在核心护盾全满的情况下完成一波防御。
description.russian: Завершите волну так, чтобы у ядра был полный щит.
description.polish: Ukończ falę z w pełni naładowanym Rdzeniem
description.brazilian: Termine uma onda com o núcleo totalmente protegido.
